caption.center: Denise ELBERSON v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (ELWYN, INC.).

opinion.posture:
Petition for Allowance of Appeal No. 547 EAL 2007 from the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
Prior Report: Pa.Cmwlth., 936 A.2d 1195.Page 464
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 18th day of March, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Petition for Supersedeas/Stay on Appeal are DENIED.
